sentences: Enamik animeid on tehtud mangade järgi.
Selles stiilis joonisfilm on väga populaarne noorte seas.
context: The word 'animed' is the Estonian genitive/plural form of 'anime', which refers to Japanese-style animated cartoons or films. This term specifically denotes animation that originated from Japan and is characterized by distinct visual features such as large eyes and colorful hair. In Estonian, it's used to refer to both individual anime shows/movies collectively as well as the genre itself.
